1.<pc>は クロウズから|竜笛を受け取った いきさつを話した。: <pc> explained how they received|the dragon's flute from Claws.

2.<pc>は オルゲンに|この里を訪れた目的を 話した。: <pc> told Orgen the purpose of|their visit to the village.

3.「……クロウズは 子供の頃からヤンチャでのう。| あやつが遊びざかりの時に よく: Claws has been mischevious since he was a|young boy. When he got the urge to play, I|would make toys for him.

4.「不幸にも あの子は 幼くして| 両親を はやり病で亡くしてな。| それからは: Sadly, his parents died of a sudden illness|when he was still young. Since then, I raised|him on my own.

5.「……そのクロウズが ある日| 意を決したように 旅に出ると言いだしおった。|『: Then one day, Claws left to go on a journey by|himself. "I want to see whats beyond the Abyss|Gate", he said.

6.「そこで 我らの同胞を見つけて 連れかえり| この さびれゆく里を 盛り立ててみ: He promised me that he'd find our people to|bring back here to breathe some life back|into this dying village.

7.「……のう <pc>よ。| クロウズは 今 どこにいるんじゃろうか？: Say, <pc>... do you know where|Claws is now?

8.<pc>は クロウズと|最後に別れた時のことを 語った。: <pc> recounted the last time they|saw and parted ways with Claws.

9.「おぉ……そうか。 | では あの子は 見事 奈落の門の向こうへ| 行くことが: Oh, I see... so that boy was able to go beyond|the Abyss Gate as he wanted...

10.「なにしろ 生まれつき 向こう見ずで| 無鉄砲なヤツだったからのう。| どうにも: After all, he's been reckless and foolhardy|for as long as I can remember. I was|quite worried about him.

11.「だが いらぬ気苦労だったな。| 竜化の術を身につけた 今のクロウズなら| 向こ: However, I worried for nothing. Now that Claws|has mastered dragonification, I'm sure he's|doing just fine in that other world.

12.「そなた クロウズの変身を 見たことはあるか？| 竜化の術……竜の姿への変化は:
Have you see him transform before?|Dragonification, or the ability to transform|into a dragon, isn't something that just any|
|Nadravian can learn.

13.「あれを 成しとげるには 選ばれた才能と| その上での厳しい修練が 必要となる。: One must be not only chosen, but also must go|through rigorous training. Claws had to work|quite hard to achieve it.

14.「……さて。待たせたのう <pc>。 | さあ これが 竜の香炉じゃ。| 受け取: Anyways... sorry that I kept you. I've|finished the Dragon Incense. Please take it.

16.「奈落の門は レンダーシアの中心……| エテーネの島の上空に 隠されているはずじ: The Abyss Gate is hidden in the heart of|Lendersia, above the Island of Ethene...|You should use the incense there.

17.「もし クロウズと再会することがあったなら| どうか あやつの助けになってくれ。: Also... if you do see Claws again, please|help him in any way you can.

18.竜の香炉のチカラで 奈落の門が 姿を現した！<me 60>: With the power of the Dragon Incense, the|Abyss Gate is revealed!<me 60>

20.「アンテロ様……よくぞ ご無事で！: We're glad that you are safe!

21.「やれやれ……ひどい音色じゃ……。| こんな 竜笛が下手クソなヤツ| この里に: Dear me, that tone is just terrible... I|didn't think anyone in this village could|play the flute so poorly...

23.「よもや 竜族以外の者が| この里に 入ってこようとは……。: You've come to this village, but you're not|Nadravian... I don't believe it...

24.「先ほど聞こえた 竜笛の音色は| そなたのものだったようじゃが……: I assume the flute that I heard just now|came from you...

25.「竜笛の技術は 竜族だけに伝わるもの。| ……そなた いったいどこで| それを: The art of playing that is passed down only|to Nadravians. Where in the world|did you learn it from?

26.「……なるほど。そなたは クロウズの……| わしの孫の 友人じゃったのか。| い: I see... so you are a friend of Claws, my|grandson. I'm sorry for being so|apprehensive.

27.「名前は……ふむ <pc>というのか。 | わしは オルゲン。| この隠れ里に住: So your name is <pc>, is it?|I am Orgen, and I am chief of this village,|the Nadravian's Rest.

28.「うむ そうじゃのう……。| まずは なにゆえ この里を訪れたのか| わしの家で: Yes, well, anyways... would you be so kind|as to tell me why you've come here? We can|discuss at my home.

29.「わしの家は 里でいちばん 高い場所にある。| それでは 先に行って 待っている: It's located in the highest part of the|village. I'll go on ahead and wait for you.

30.「おうおう よう来なすった。| 今 お茶を出すから| 遠慮なく かけてくれ。: I'm so glad you came. Please have a seat.|I'll get you some tea.

31.「こうして ずっと隠れて暮らしていると| 毎日 生活に 張り合いがなくてのう。|:
Being hidden away for so long, I suppose I|don't have much energy for normal daily|things. This place hasn't had an outsider|
|come in ages.

32.「……しかし わざわざ こんな| 年寄りばかりの へんぴな村まで| そなた いっ: But I have to ask... what brought you all the|way to this remote village filled with|old folk?

33.「な なんと……。 | 竜族の男が あちこちで人を襲い| 誘拐しているじゃと……: W-what did you say...? A Nadravian man is|attacking and kidnapping people from all|over...?!

34.「バカな……クロウズを除けば| 竜族は 今 この里にいる者だけじゃ。| にわかに: Nonsense... except for Claws, the only|Nadravians left are the ones still in this|village. It's difficult to believe...

35.「……しかし そのようなウソをついたところで| そなたに 得があるとも思えんな。: But, I don't think you have any reason to lie|to me. By any chance, is he...

36.「……奈落の門の向こうから やってきた| 竜族なのかも知れん。: ...a Nadravian who came from beyond the Abyss|Gate, perhaps...

37.「奈落の門……その向こうは 神代の昔に| アストルティアから 切りはなされた世界: Beyond the Abyss Gate is a world that was cut|off from Astoltia a long time ago. It's|said to be the home of the Nadravians.

38.「……わしらは その門が閉ざされたときに| こちらの世界に 取り残されてしまった: ...and we are the descendants of the|Nadravians who were left behind here|after the gate was closed.

39.「そういえば 先日 里の外に出ていた者が| エテーネの島の上空に 巨大な門が浮上:
Now that you mention it, someone outside of|the village the other day said a huge gate|appeared over Ethene, and then shortly after|
|disappeared.

40.「それが 奈落の門だとするならば| 門は消えたのではなく その場に存在したまま|: If that really was the Abyss Gate, then it is|still there. It's just invisible.

41.「……そう。この隠れ里に施されたものと同様の| 竜族に伝わる幻術で 隠されておる: Indeed. It is being concealed by the same kind|of illusion that hides this village.

42.「その幻を生み出し 制御しているのが| この里の中央にもある 竜の香炉という|: These illusions are maintained by a special|device called Dragon Incense. It is located in|the center of the village.

43.「そなたが その竜族の男を追うため| 消えた奈落の門を 見つけだすつもりなら|: If you intend to find the Abyss Gate in your|pursuit of that man, you will need that|incense.

44.「この里のものを 貸すわけにはいかんが……| １回きりのものでよければ 孫の友人: I can't lend you something our village|needs... but for this special occasion, I can|make one for you, as a friend of my grandson.

45.「そうじゃな……材料として 幻竜草と| 竜の芯骨さえ 調達できれば| あとは な: Right... if you can procure a Ghostlily and a|Dragon Bone yourself, I can take care of the|rest.

46.「竜の芯骨は ドラクロン山地へ行き| 第１層の 中央の洞くつ内にいる| スカルゴ: A Dragon Bone can be obtained by going to the|Draklon Mountains and defeating a Skelegon in|the center cave of the first level.

47.「ふたつとも集まったら わしの所まで来なされ。| 竜の香炉を作り 奈落の門にかけ: When you have gathered them both, I will make|some Dragon Incense for you, which will break|the Abyss Gate's illusion.

48.「……どうやら 見事 例の男に| 打ち勝ったようじゃな。: It seems that you've defeated that man|you were looking for.

49.「なにやら イヤな予感がしてのう。| そなたを心配して 来てみたが……。| 浮か: I had a bad feeling, so I came here to make|sure everything was okay, but... your face|tells me otherwise. What happened here?

51.「……ふむ なるほどな。| これは 奈落の門を開けるための| カギの役割を果たす: Hmmm, I see... it seems this seal serves as a|key to open the Abyss Gate.

52.「むぅぅ……これはまた 難解な仕組みで| できているのう……。| この印は神代の: Hmm, this also seems to be quite an intricate|mechanism... this mark from the age of the|gods... no, that's not... *mumble, mumble*

53.「のう <cs_pchero>。| そなた 仲間を助けるために| 奈落の門の向こ: <cs_pchero>. You're planning on|going beyond the Abyss Gate to save your|friends, aren't you?<yesno><close>

54.「いいや。隠す必要はないぞ。| そなたの本音を 聞かせてくれればよい。: There's no need to hide it. Please tell me|your true feelings.

55.「うむ やはり そうであったか。| ならば そなたに 語っておかねばなるまい。|: That's what I thought you'd say. In that case,|I must tell you something. Beyond that gate|lies the world of the Nadravians...

56.「これは 古き竜族の技によって 作られた物。| 他の種族の者には あつかえぬが|: This was made by ancient techniques of the|Nadravians. No other race can repair it, so|I should be able to do it for you.

57.「気が急くじゃろうが しばしの辛抱じゃ。| かならず 直してみせるから 待ってい: I know you're in a hurry, but please just be|patient and trust me. I will fix it, I|promise! Now, if you'll excuse me!

58.「待たせたな……私だ。: Sorry for the wait... it's me.

59.「……予想外の妨害にあってな。| 完全には 使命を果たせなかった。: Due to some unexpected setbacks, I wasn't able|to fulfill the mission.

60.「あの方には 合わせる顔もないが……| まだ あきらめたわけではない。| 引き続: I'm not able to show my face to them, but I|haven't given up just yet. I will keep|searching for the remaining vessels.

61.「せめて 今は このふたりだけでも| あちらに 連れていってくれ。: In the meantime, you can take those two over|there for now.

64.「どうやって この門の幻術を| 解いたかは知らぬが……: I don't know how you managed to break this|illusion, but...

65.「よかろう。これまでの失態を清算するためにも| ここで 決着をつけてくれるわ。: It matters not. It's time to settle the score|for what you did to me before.

66.「あの方の加護を受けられる| この場所でならば 存分に戦える……。| 今こそ 我: In this place, where I can receive his|blessing... I can fight at my full strength.|Let me show you my true power!

67.「なんという……強さ……。| 貴様……ただの<cs_pchero_race>では: What... strength... you're no... ordinary|<cs_pchero_race>, are you... However...!

68.「門の向こうは 我ら 竜族の領域……| 貴様に 行かせはせぬっ！！: Beyond this gate lies the domain of my people,|the Nadravians! I will not let you pass!

70.「たゆたう炎よ…… この世界の行く末を| 我らの待望する かの者の到来せし未来を: O flickering flame... Show us now the future|of this world we long for, and the arrival of|the one that we await.

71.「……間もなくじゃ。| もう間もなく 約束されし解放者が| このナドラガンドの地: Soon... soon the promised liberator will|appear here in the land of Nadragand.

72.「……失礼します 総主教さま。| 間もなく 礼拝が始まる時間ですが……。: Excuse me, Patriarch... It's almost time for|the service to begin...

73.「我らが神よ。その日まで……| どうか 竜族の民を お守りくだされ。: To our god... until that day comes, please|protect all of dragonkind.

74.「幻竜草は この隠れ里の中心にある| 竜の香炉の辺りに 生えておるはずじゃ。|: Ghostlily should be growing around the Dragon|Incense in the center of the village. Be sure|to search thoroughly.

75.「クロウズが竜笛を 託したのなら| そなたは 信頼に足る人物なのじゃろう。| こ: If Claws gave you his flute, then he must|trust you greatly. I will gladly welcome you|as a guest in this village.

76.「それが クロウズの友人で| しかも 竜族以外の種族とはな……| 長生きはしてみ: That's a friend of Claws, and not even|Nadravian, no less... having a long life does|have its benefits.

77.「クロウズが 里を出て行ってからというもの| となりにある あやつの部屋も がら: Ever since Claws left, his room has been|empty, and things have been a bit lonely.

78.「あのヤンチャ坊主が 竜化の術を会得した日……| わしは その姿を しっかりと目: The day that mischevious boy mastered it...|That image will forever be burned into my|mind. I'll never forget it...

79.アンテロが倒れたあとに 粉々に砕かれた|破片が 散らばっている。: After Antero fell, the fragments were|shattered to pieces and scattered about.

81.「おお……これが 奈落の門か。| なんと巨大で 荘厳な造りじゃ。: Ohh... so this is the Abyss Gate. How majestic|it truly is...

83.「ナドラガンドは アストルティアより隔絶され| 長きに渡り いっさいの交流が途絶: Separated from Astoltia, Nadragand is an|unknown world. They have not made any contact|in quite a long time...

84.「我らの常識では 計り知れぬ場所じゃ。| そして そこへ旅立つ者には| あまたの: It is a place beyond our understanding. And|those who travel there will have to endure|many hardships...

85.「それでも 行くと言うなら……| <cs_pchero>よ。ひとまず コイツは|: But if you really still insist on going...|I'll take care of this for the time being.

86.「まあ まかせておけ。仲間を助けたいと願い| 苦難に立ち向かわんとする そなたの: Just leave it to me. I have a sudden urge to|support the hardships that have yet to come|so you can help your friends.

87.「また来たか <cs_pchero>。| おろかなヤツめ……。: You, again? You are a fool...

88.「何度挑もうが 同じこと。| ここが 貴様の墓場となるのだ。: Give up, your resistance is futile. This place|will be your graveyard.

89.「我らの野望は ついえぬ……。| 今ふたたび 我が真の実力を 思い知るがいい！: My ambitions remain unfulfilled and now you|will once again see the true strength of a|Nadravian!

90.「ふん……。| この程度で 勝ったつもりか？| 下等種族の分際で 片腹痛いわ！: Do you really think you've won? You're from an|inferior species, and I'll not allow you to|cause me more trouble!

91.「……お前たちは 先に行け。| ネズミが まぎれこむ前に 門を閉じよ。: You two, go on ahead. Close that gate before|these mice get in.

92.「教えてやろう <cs_pchero>……。| 選ばれし民 竜族の 絶対的な強さ: Let me show you! The absolute strength of the|Nadravians, they who have been chosen!

94.「貴様を 門の向こうに行かせるわけにはいかぬ！| 我らを邪魔立てした その罪科…: I will not let you enter this gate! You shall|atone for your crimes of obstruction by my|fangs and claws!

95.竜の香炉は 音もなく くずれさった。: The Dragon Incense disintegrated into nothing.

96.<cs_pchero>は ここで起こった出来事を|オルゲンに説明した。: <cs_pchero> explained to Orgen|everything that had happened here.

97.「……なんと。男は倒したが| 仲間は 奈落の門の向こうへ| 連れ去られてしまった: Oh, dear... you defeated that man, but your|friends were still taken beyond the Abyss|Gate? Hmmm...
